medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp constant right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain with radiation to the back for the past 36 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a history of intermittent RUQ abdominal pain that has been self-limited. The last episode occurred several days ago, followed by the current episode that has persisted for 36 hours. The patient states that nothing alleviates the pain and denies any specific triggers.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history: none. Past surgical history: excision of back cyst several years ago.
